name: Cat's Bar
description:
Cat’s Bar is a simulation game.You acting as a white cat and runs a bar in 3 months(game time),you can make wine and pick materials and so on,then you can choose to Recall the goddess or not.
It’s the same background of the story with A Day For A Kitten,like a extra episode.
You can meet familiar roles in the game.
Come and run your bar!

If you find the game have some strange problem,try to restart or reinstall the game.

Features
· Lovely characters and unique scene style
· Time variation.
· Diverse scenes
· Wine mode

Basic Operation
· Click the left mouse button to move
· Press right mouse button rotate the view
· Slide mouse middle button to zoom view.
